tool_description: An API that returns links to vegan recipes
name: vegan-recipes-api
title: vegan-recipes-api

api_list.name: Get Vegan Recipes from  Specific Food Blog
api_list.description: This endpoint returns vegan recipes from a specific food blog, given the food blog's name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vegan-recipes-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/thewoksoflife"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vegan-recipes-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vegan-recipes-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/{blogid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vegan-recipes-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Vegan Recipes
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all vegan recipes from a variety of food blogs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vegan-recipes-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vegan-recipes-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
